rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a foyer that respects the Vastu principles of auspicious directions. It integrates natural light through a large window facing east and serves as an initial transition space.

The open-plan area combines kitchen, dining, and living spaces for a joint family environment. Designed with an emphasis on Bohemian style featuring natural materials, artisanal fixtures, and ample windows for ventilation.
A dedicated space located towards the rear of the plot, ensuring privacy and convenience for household help while following Vastu guidelines by situating it away from main living areas.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance aligned with auspicious directions as per Vastu principles, ensuring energy flows and positive vibes.
Large windows to ensure ample natural light in the kitchen, promoting a healthy environment.
Skylights integrated into the living area for additional ventilation and illumination during all hours.

rooms.description: A generously sized master bedroom featuring Bohemian decor elements such as intricate patterns, natural fabrics, and accent lighting. It includes a small ensuite bathroom.
Another bedroom designed to accommodate joint family members or guests, ensuring privacy with Vastu-informed layout and natural light sources.
A dedicated private gym space focusing on health and wellness for the household. Incorporates ample ventilation and strategically placed mirrors to enhance spaciousness.

openings.description: Windows placed according to Vastu guidelines in both east and west directions for optimal natural light and air flow.
Large ventilation window designed to ensure fresh air circulation during workout sessions.
